description: Once you upload a report, you will associate it with a participant. At that point, the participant, their providers, and their research coordinators will be able to view and download the report.

metaData.title: Biomarker report upload | Cancer Moonshot Biobank

error.message: Please double check the Participant ID on the hard copy of the report and re-enter it above. If this problem persists, contact the system administrator.
error.title: This participant is not in the system

upload.form_title: Enter the ID of the participant associated with this report.
upload.input_error: Please enter a valid Participant ID
upload.input_helper_text: This number is on the top of the report

fileType.message: The selected file must be a pdf. Please remove the file and try again.
fileType.title: Incorrect file type

onServer.message: We're sorry, something went wrong. Please remove the file and try to upload the report again.
onServer.title: Report failed to upload

success.message: We sent an email to let the participant, their providers, and their research coordinator know.
success.title: Biomarker report uploaded successfully!
